website_summaries.verdict: A comprehensive set that includes long fins and a mesh bag. Despite a few quirks, it's worth a look for beginners and occasional snorkelers.
pros: In addition to a mask, this set includes long fins that propel nicely in the water
Gear bag has mesh material that enables items inside to dry quickly
Set comes at a reasonable price
cons: Mask leaks have been reported, plus it runs on the large side and doesn't seal well on all users

customer_reviews.title: Now it’s safe to go back into the water
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked US Divers gear and the longer fins. Provides lots of fun for me and my family in pools rivers and ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Zyrlu

customer_reviews.title: Loved them. Used them in Puerto Rico this past week and they were great
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about these for the price. Great set, great color options and nice carrying case. The fins are easy to put on and take off with a little tab on the back. The mask and snorkel worked great. I cant speak on durability as I've only used them for a few days and I will update this post with anything changes but as of now, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tampa User

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The fins were tight. The mask and snorkel were of a low quality but I didn't pay hundreds of dollars either. I bought this for my boat and whatever. It more than meets my needs, and at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Glad we purchased!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for a trip to Hawaii and they were quite nice for the price. The silicone around the goggles fit nicely on the face. The flippers are very sturdy but at the same time, soft enough to make swimming a breeze. The zippered bag is also very decent quality.
customer_reviews.author: M.N.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandsons birthday. He’s only used it in a pool environment but he’s enjoyed using both mask and fins for diving for objects and racing his cousin. The mask fits properly and the fins do not hurt his feet or leave blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Judy S.

customer_reviews.title: It's super easy to carry around in its pouch
customer_reviews.text: As an avid snorkeler, this set has gone above and beyond. It's super easy to carry around in its pouch. The fins are the perfect size for beginners, and the perfect shape that will allow more experienced snorkelers to exercise their skills. I've had this set for 3 years now, and my friend finally broke it, so I bought it again.
customer_reviews.author: Zayd

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to buy it at first cause of other reviews but I decided to go for it. I go free diving for treasure like lures and stuff in rivers and it works well. Flippers don't slide off and the snorkel blows water out and doesn't leak. The mask for me dowsmt hurt and is comfortable but the deeper I go it does get tighter but if you are just looking for something to swim on the surface with it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G

customer_reviews.title: Entry level set and doubt mask would seal
customer_reviews.text: Mask seal not silicone, but plastic and fin rubber thin and stiff. You definitely get what you pay for. Spend $50 more and get something more functional.
customer_reviews.author: johnnymmmm

customer_reviews.title: this is a nice set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a nice set for the price. The mask and snorkel are decent. The fins are nice because they do not have straps. You just slide your foot in and no need to tighten or worry about the straps and plastic fasteners breaking. The fins stay on your feet in the water. The carrying case is just ok. I would recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Me

customer_reviews.title: Clasp made of plastic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item to use in Dominica republic and the clasp that holds the strap on the googles broke on second use when I was a quarter mile from where I started leaving them useless. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: michael Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Fins :-(
customer_reviews.text: Mask and snorkel were good. I found the fins to be overly large and very stiff. Not sure if this was the best pick for simple snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: Swernt

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect for our trip to Hawaii
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for our trip to Hawaii. They came in a convenient carry bag and we were able to put it in our luggage. I liked the color, but most importantly the fit was good. The mask did not leak at all. And it was comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DiGi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful; all in one.
customer_reviews.text: What a hit! Great product and great price. The bag is big enough for my mask and fins, it is really a great product.
customer_reviews.author: crewmom62

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fin sizes are off, did not fit, had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: HalibutZach

customer_reviews.title: I labeled  this as Ok
customer_reviews.text: This is really a nice product for what I paid. It would have been great if I had the funds for a great product. I got what I paid for. If you just have little to spend this will definitely work out. I like the compartmentalized bag. It has a separate Velcro enclosure for the mask.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The snorkel clip broke the second time I wore it - poor quality, I've sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: lilian la grasta

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! This set is excellent quality and works very well. Mask fits perfectly and the snorkel is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: T. Breeden

customer_reviews.title: I think it is great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Fits as describe. I think it is great for beginners. I like how it comes with a carrying back.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the size is compact for travel, I did not try them.
customer_reviews.author: jazzbox

customer_reviews.title: Love having this for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I bought two but lost one pair of goggles in the ocean lol damn
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good but didn't use mask
customer_reviews.text: Used it just fine, but I bought a rx mask, so I didn't use the one that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: chunkysoop

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a Caribbean vacation and snorkeling with younger daughters. Comfortable and easy for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: DENISE MCALLISTER

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Works great for ocean snorkeling. Excellent fit!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, runs somewhat small
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be of good quality. Fins felt too small for me and had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Macaccus Rhesus

customer_reviews.title: perfect ta mate
customer_reviews.text: using it right now 3 hours a day in Waikiki perfect
customer_reviews.author: pete missen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very reasonable priced set for recreational snorkeling- the masks fogs at times which is irritating when diving
customer_reviews.author: Riko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works fine and we used it on our trip and didnt have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Anoop

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome set! I use it in the lake to swim laps.
customer_reviews.author: JuJuBee

customer_reviews.title: it work
customer_reviews.text: The mask seals on the face well and the fins propel you through the water without falling off. Perfect for pool time!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Killebrew

customer_reviews.title: Took on trip to the Keys
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set each for my wife and I. Worked perfect for a trip down to the Keys. I would certainly recommend to others and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: It was a great set and fit perfectly. I especially liked the price. A friend of mine paid the same price for a pair of fins, same brand, that I paid for the set. Plus it comes with a carrying case. I wasn't sure what to expect for such a reasonable price and I did a ton of snorkeling on St John.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Angelico

customer_reviews.title: Too bulky
customer_reviews.text: The mask was very bulky and didn’t get a good seal.
customer_reviews.author: Sara P.

customer_reviews.title: ... an order of 3 diferent sets overral everything was perfect except the blue set because it Came broken
customer_reviews.text: I made an order of 3 diferent sets overral everything was perfect except the blue set because it Came broken. My husband was very disapoint.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Rabassa

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: Spent several hours snorkeling in Cozumel and would highly recommend this gear. The mesh bag with its' shoulder strap is a great feature as well.
customer_reviews.author: JDS Savannah

customer_reviews.title: This fin size is very good. Quality is very good
customer_reviews.text: This fin size is very good. Quality is very good. like it very much. It has been used in the pricess cays in Bahama.
customer_reviews.author: Molei

customer_reviews.title: The same set fit my husband and son just fine, however
customer_reviews.text: If you are a female, this mask might not fit you well. The skirt of the mask comes down so far onto my upper lip, that I couldn't wear it to snorkel. The same set fit my husband and son just fine, however. My adult daughter and I could not wear this mask. We bought three sets-one of the bags ripped right away, which was a hassle since we were in Hawaii on vacation. The other two bags are still fine.
customer_reviews.author: K. Guillen

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product and will not buy again. My wife and I were on vacation with our family and were planning on snorkeling in the ocean in Mexico. We no more than got in the water and were putting our masks on when one of them had the band snap making it unusable. I am relatively handy and was unable to get it back together in a way that it could be used. While I was not expecting a top of the line product for this price I was definitely expecting it to last more than 5 minutes. Very cheap material and ruined our being able to enjoy the underwater wildlife with our family.
customer_reviews.author: HILL28

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until the last day when the plastic pin broke on the mask.
customer_reviews.author: Motherlml

customer_reviews.title: mask made of poor quality pvc
customer_reviews.text: mask made of poor quality pvc ..over sized ..pvc with sharp edges .in the mask will hurt when u wear ..fins are ok .. tube again made of poor quality.... do not buy the product...u will regret
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: The fins and snorkel are fine but we ordered three sets of these and all of the masks are defective. None of them will lock into the sizes that we want and therefore leak.
customer_reviews.author: donna

product_meta.title: U.S. Divers Cozumel Seabreeze Adult Snorkeling Combo Set with Adjustable Mask, Snorkel, Medium/Large Fins (8-9.5), and Travel Bag, Blue
product_meta.description: The Cozumel Snorkel Set is perfect for recreational snorkelers and water enthusiasts looking for the best value snorkeling set for their next underwater adventure. The set includes a one-size-fits-most 2-window adjustable mask, snorkel with a splash top and one-way purge valve, full foot pocket dual composite vented fins for excellent power and energy saving efficiency, and a gear bag with mesh panel.
feature_bullets: COZUMEL SNORKELING SET: Comfort is key when it comes to underwater exploration. The ergonomically-designed snorkel set is made with dual-material construction that gives you a flexible, secure, customizable fit. Cozumel set includes an adult mask, snorkel, dual fins, and a travel bag. Fins are medium/large and fit 8 - 9.5 shoe size

EASY-TO-USE: The Cozumel mask has a 3-Way adjust Pro-Glide buckle that allows you to easily fit the mask to your face for maximum comfort. Low profile two-window design and tempered glass lens offer a secure, leak-free, anti-fog experience streamlined fit for hours of comfortable, clear view exploring.

SNORKEL: The Seabreeze snorkel has a comfortable, ergonomically-shaped mouthpiece designed to reduce jaw fatigue, and a one-way purge to easily clean any accumulated water. With Splash guard top uses Hydro-adhesion technology to prevent splashed water from entering snorkel barrel

DUAL FINS: The large dual composite fins with vented blades provide excellent power and energy-saving efficiency with soft closed-heel foot pocket will snug and fit comfortably on your barefoot for sizes 8 - 9.5 shoe size enhance your snorkeling adventures when exploring and uncovering new depths

EXPLORE ANYWHERE: The compact gear bag makes it easy to store and transport your snorkel equipment and has a mesh panel for quick drying to avoid mildew buildup on your gear. Whether you’re a first-time diver or a seasoned professional this set will amplify your next adventures
